dialog_1.name: Orchard Theatre Employee
dialog_1.text: Welcome to the Orchard Theatre! Today, 06 Jan 1965, is our opening day!

dialog_2.name: Orchard Theatre Employee
dialog_2.text: At Orchard Theatre, we strive to stream new and exciting movies for our customer!

dialog_3.name: Orchard Theatre Employee
dialog_3.text: Permission to take picture? It is allowed of course!

dialog_4.name: Orchard Theatre Employee
dialog_4.text: Today is a joyous day! Take as many photos as you want!
